name: .POPSHAPE File Extension
summary: Learn about .POPSHAPE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Character shape file used by PopChar, an OS X utility tool for accessing special characters and adding them to documents; contains a drawing of a character shape.

content: PopChar allows you to draw the shape of the character you are looking for then returns results that match your drawing. The POPSHAPE file is used by PopChar to match the character shapes of all the different fonts with your drawing.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
